segments.text: Hello , Hanson . Today I come to say goodbye to you , for I'm going back to London tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , not so soon . Couldn ’ t I persuade you to stay a couple of days more ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Much as I wish to but I really can ’ t . I've already booked the flight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I hope this won ’ t be our last meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course not . You can come to London to visit me in future . And I also will come here if I have a chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will miss you , too . You're really a good friend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a pity that I'm too busy to see you off tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take care of yourself and remember to keep in touch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Goodbye and have a good flight .
segments.speaker: S2
